p:
Germination percentages of the groups (%) were determined by screening the roots sprout up from the stems (Eq. 1)
24 . In this study, emergence of the roots was considered as germination of the bulbs and 50 bulbs were used to determine the germination percentage of each group.
1
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {\text{Germination}}\;{\text{ percentage}}\;\left( \% \right) = \left[ {{\text{Number}}\;{\text{of}}\;{\text{germinated}}\;{\text{members}}\;{\text{of}}\;{\text{each}}\;{\text{group}}/{\text{Number}}\;{\text{of}}\;{\text{total}}\;{\text{members}}\;{\text{of}}\;{\text{each}}\;{\text{group}}} \right] \times 100.$$\end{document}
Germination
percentage
%
=
Number
of
germinated
members
of
each
group / Number
of

× 100 .
